content.rendered:
INFRASTRUCTURE

Overview

Suguna has 70+ hatcheries across the country and supplies an average of 500+ million chicks a year. The state-of-the-art facilities were designed to collaborate minimal human intervention on par with global standards.

The fully automated technology helps upto 85% better hatchability of our chicks. Our team works tirelessly to create and supply the healthiest chicks with the highest growth potential and feed conversion ratio (FCR).

<title>Feed Mill - Suguna Foods | India's largest Animal Feed Mill</title>
<meta name="description" content="Suguna Foods has the largest feed mill in India at Hoskote in Bangalore district. The animal feed mill is completely automated and on par with global standards." />
